allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate hardcoded URLs to environment variables

- Add APP_DOMAIN variable for Caddy configuration
- Add NEXT_PUBLIC_BOT_SCRIPT_URL for chatbot script
- Update Dockerfile with new environment variable
- Update docker-compose.yml to use dynamic domain
- Update layout.tsx to use bot script URL from env
- Add .env.example with all required variables

This allows easy switching between domains (pruebas.coradir.ai / complejos.coradir.com.ar) without code changes.

Co-Authored-By: IA Software Coradir <ia@coradir.com.ar>
EOF
)")
